caption:
This photograph depicts two men working within a room filled with electronic equipment. The room appears to be a control room or similar technical setup, suggested by the large racks of equipment featuring various dials, switches, and readouts. On the right, a man in a striped shirt and dark pants is bending over a piece of equipment, focusing on adjusting or examining it. Another man, wearing a cowboy hat and a light-colored trench coat, is sitting to the left, facing a panel that he is operating, possibly adjusting settings or monitoring the system.

The background shows a large window and a wall clock, indicating the time as approximately 11:06. The lighting is subdued, giving an emphasis on the tasks being performed with an overall tone of serious and concentrated work atmosphere. This setting has a vintage or dated feel, likely depicting a scene from several decades ago judging by the style of the equipment and the men's attire. The image captures a moment of technical operation, likely focusing on communication, broadcasting, or some form of data processing, evident from the complex electronic devices visible.
title: Technicians work at the data control center for the LIMTV (Linear Induction Motor Test Vehicle). The Department of Transportation High Speed Ground Test Center is the site for experimental work on new methods of high speed ground transportation.
